pkgmetadata.longdescription: Recurrent Event Regression // A collection of regression models for recurrent event process and failure time data. Available methods include these from Xu et al. (2017) doi:10.1080/01621459.2016.1173557, Lin et al. (2000) doi:10.1111/1467-9868.00259, Wang et al. (2001) doi:10.1198/016214501753209031, Ghosh and Lin (2003) doi:10.1111/j.0006-341X.2003.00102.x, and Huang and Wang (2004) doi:10.1198/016214504000001033.
